name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in building high-performance applications, specializing in **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**. Proficient in modern frontend tools and frameworks including **Storybook**, **Radix UI**, **Tailwind**, and testing libraries such as **Playwright**, **Vitest**, and **Cypress**. Strong background in UI/UX design principles, including animations and utilizing **Three.js**, **R3F**, and **WebGPU** for innovative visual solutions. 

Experienced in integrating AI technologies, leveraging **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, **LangChain**, and **Stable Diffusion** for developing intelligent, user-centric applications. Skilled in building RESTful and GraphQL APIs, ensuring seamless data communication through **WebSocket** protocols.

Comprehensively knowledgeable in cloud services with hands-on deployment on **Docker** and proficient in backend technologies including **Node.js** and **Python**. A collaborative problem-solver with a track record of implementing CI/CD processes, delivering projects aligned with strict compliance standards, and enhancing overall application performance.
